name: 4-Class Combo
description: Plan on attending all of the classes? Save some money when you purchase all 4 lessons together! Choose your date combination when you order. * No refunds for cancellations less than 48 hours in advance. If you have a last-minute cancellation, you can use your reservation for a later date’s class (just give us a call and let us know your change). For more information, contact Carolyn Minutillo at lavenderhillfloral@gmail.com

name: Lesson 1
description: The first Petal Works class will be focused on the basics of vase arrangements (with a few expert secrets, of course!). Lessons will be held on Tuesday, September 10, or Thursday, September 26 — both from 6:30-8:30 p.m. You do not need to attend both classes. • Flowers, vases, snippers and other materials will be provided • Light appetizers will be provided. • Seating is limited. * No refunds for cancellations less than 48 hours in advance. If you have a last-minute cancellation, you can use your reservation for a later date’s class (just give us a call and let us know your change). For more information, contact Carolyn Minutillo at lavenderhillfloral@gmail.com.

name: Lesson 2
description: The second Petal Works class will be focused on the art of making wreaths (with a few expert secrets, of course!). Lessons will be held on Tuesday, October 8, or Thursday, October 24 — both from 6:30-8:30 p.m. You do not need to attend both classes. • Flowers, wreath bases, and other materials will be provided • Light appetizers will be provided. • Seating is limited. • No refunds for cancellations less than 48 hours in advance. If you have a last-minute cancellation, you can use your reservation for a later date’s class (just give us a call and let us know your change). For more information, contact Carolyn Minutillo at lavenderhillfloral@gmail.com.

name: Lesson 3
description: The third Fall Petal Works class will be focused on creating seasonal centerpieces (with a few expert secrets, of course!). Lessons will be held on either Tuesday, November 5, or Thursday, November 21 — both from 6:30-8:30 p.m. You do not need to attend both classes. • Flowers, vases, snippers and other materials will be provided • Light appetizers will be provided. • Seating is limited. • No refunds for cancellations less than 48 hours in advance. If you have a last-minute cancellation, you can use your reservation for a later date’s class (just give us a call and let us know your change). For more information, contact Carolyn Minutillo at lavenderhillfloral@gmail.com.

name: Lesson 4
description: The final Fall Petal Works class will be focused on creating beautiful holiday-themed centerpieces (with a few expert secrets, of course!). Lessons will be held on Tuesday, December 10 from 6:30-8:30 p.m. • Flowers, vases, snippers and other materials will be provided • Light appetizers will be provided. • Seating is limited. * No refunds for cancellations less than 48 hours in advance. If you have a last-minute cancellation, you can use your reservation for a later date’s class (just give us a call and let us know your change).
